name: Murky
description:
2018 7DRL

You are an elven hunter on quest to defeat whatever beast has been terrorising the forest, armed with you bow and a couple of arrows you set out.

Arrows don't instantly hit so you may need to lead targets or predict their movement, you can kick enemies away if they get too close or use elven speed to dash away or fire multiple times.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move,
  • Z to aim, then Arrow keys to fire
  • X to slow time
  • Enter / Select to pause

Open source code can be found here

7DRL Challenge Evaluation can be found here https://itch.io/jam/7drl-challenge-2018/rate/230186
